structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.text: The commissioner of housing, buildings and construction may appoint an advisory board composed of persons actively engaged in the liquefied petroleum gas industry in the State of Kentucky. The board shall give the commissioner the benefit of its technical knowledge to aid him or her in supervising and regulating the liquefied petroleum gas industry.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 500, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 28, effective July 1,1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 20. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 30, sec. 2.
